Flying Pests

It sounds like you've got a flying pest insect! Is it one of these?

  • Blister Beetle

    Blister beetles are a common field and garden pest best known for the welt-raising secretion they release when injured or crushed.

  • Asparagus Beetle

    The common asparagus beetle, are pests of asparagus.
